com.iKairos.Utils

Class u.CSV

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iKairos.Utils.u.CSV
  • Enclosing class:
    u

    public static class u.CSV
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a CSV file.
    Its purpose is to ease creation of csv files for model testing and related output visualisation in excel, or any other custom visualisation tools that we might build.
    Author:
    Nimrod

    • Constructor Detail

      • u.CSV

        public u.CSV(java.lang.String[] colHeadings,
     java.lang.String fileName)
        Creates a new CSV object that represents an editable CSV file.
        Parameters:
        colHeadings - The headings of the columns of the csv
        fileName - The simple name of the file to which the contents of the CSV object should be saved. It must not contain a file extension. The extension is .csv by default

    • Method Detail

      • appendToRow

        public void appendToRow(java.lang.String cellValue)
        Adds a single string value to the current row.
        Parameters:
        cellValue - The single string value to add to the current row. It cannot contain commas

      • appendToNewLine

        public void appendToNewLine(java.lang.String cellValue)
        Creates a new row and adds a single string value to the newly created row.
        Parameters:
        cellValue - The single string value to add to the new row. It cannot contain commas

      • save

        public boolean save()
        Save the created CSV object as a *.csv file
        Returns:
        true, if successful
